translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽The Dhamma Paccanīyānuloma, Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)🔽23.49. Sanidassanattika, Sekkhattika🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sa ni dassa nattika sekkhattika  na sanidassana sappaṭigham na sekkham dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ sekkhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na sanidassana sappaṭigham na asekkham dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ asekkhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With-object-of-sense-sphere, with-object-of-sense-sphere-in-training🔽With-object-of-sense-sphere, with-object-of-sense-sphere-in-training as condition, an object-of-sense-sphere, with-object-of-sense-sphere-in-training, is produced. (In brief.) With root cause three … With ignorance three … With the taints three.🔽With-object-of-sense-sphere, with-object-of-sense-sphere-in-no-longer-in-training as condition, an object-of-sense-sphere, with-object-of-sense-sphere-in-no-longer-in-training, is produced. (In brief.) With root cause three … With ignorance three … With the taints three.

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho🔽nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na nevasekkha nāsekkham dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ  nevasekkha nāsekkhaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa adhipatiyā
translated: With-object-of-sense-sphere, with-object-of-sense-sphere-in-neither-in-training-nor-no-longer-in-training as condition, an object-of-sense-sphere, with-object-of-sense-sphere-in-neither-in-training-nor-no-longer-in-training, is produced. (In brief.) With root cause twenty-one … With predominance twenty-one … With ignorance twenty-one … With the taints twenty-one.

With-object-of-sense-sphere, with-object-of-sense-sphere-in-neither-in-training-nor-no-longer-in-training as condition, an object-of-sense-sphere, with-object-of-sense-sphere-in-neither-in-training-nor-no-longer-in-training, is produced. (In brief.) With root cause twenty-one … With predominance twenty-one … With ignorance twenty-one … With the taints twenty-one.
